+func runfilesPath(sourcePath string) (string, error) {
+	programPath, err := os.Executable()
+	if err != nil {
+		return "", err
+	}
+	return path.Join(programPath+".runfiles", "com_github_livegrep_livegrep", sourcePath), nil
+}
+

 	flag.Parse()
